name: The Second Floor (Horror)
description:
The Second Floor

Venture into the second floor of a dark and mysterious warehouse to collect your homework that you left in there the day before...

However, this homework is not any ordinary homework, it is an important assignment. Handing in this homework dictates whether you progress to the next level in your studies or get retained in the same level for another year... but will you be able to pluck up your courage to retrieve it from the depths of darkness?

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

WASD to move

F to toggle flashlight

Tags

#horror #warehouse #adventurehorror #adventure
